articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets to Yemeni President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets to Yemeni President
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Abd Rabbuh Mansur Al Hadi, president of the Republic of Yemen, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message sincerely wished the president and people of Yemen bigger successes in the work to achieve social stability of the country and its economic development.

articles.title: DPRK's Young Pianist Proves Successful in Int'l Juvenile Piano Concours
articles.content:
DPRK's Young Pianist Proves Successful in Int'l Juvenile Piano Concours
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK's 12 year-old student Yu Pyol Mi took the second place at the first Astana International Juvenile Piano Concours held in Astana, Kazakhstan between May 10 and 16.
					 The concours was aimed to find out music prodigies in the world and boost the international exchange of piano art. It was divided into three groups according to the ages 7 to 18.
					
					 In each group participants had to pass preliminaries to be qualified and compete in the first and second phases.
					
					 30 participants were qualified for concours out of 140 juvenile pianists from various countries including the DPRK, Russia, China, Australia and the U.S. who played in preliminaries.
					
					 Each of the 30 pianists played a solo at the first phase and piano concerto together with the Astana National Symphony Orchestra at the second phase.
					
					 Yu was qualified at the preliminaries for her remarkable talent and piano rendition. Belonging to Group B (aged 11 to 14) she successfully played foreign music at the first phase.
					
					 Though she had no experience of playing a concerto with a symphony orchestra, she perfectly represented it at the second phase, winning admiration of even musicians.
					
					 She was awarded a diploma of the second place at a closing ceremony held on May 16.

articles.title: 1st Batch of Rason-Mt. Kumgang Tourist Group Tours Mt. Kumgang
articles.content:
1st Batch of Rason-Mt. Kumgang Tourist Group Tours Mt. Kumgang
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The 1st batch of Rason-Mt. Kumgang international tourist group arrived at the Kosong port by the ship "Royale Star" on Monday. 
					 Displayed at the port was the banner with letters reading "Warm welcome to the international tourists aboard 'Royale Star' to Mt. Kumgang". The group was welcomed at the port by officials concerned and inhabitants in Kosong County. 
					
					 Leading members of the group paid floral tribute to "The great leaders Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il on Mt. Paektu", a mosaic mural built in front of the Kumgangsan Hotel.
					
					 On the day, the group members toured the Kuryong Pool, Singye Temple, Sea Kumgang and Lagoon Samil. 
					
					 Ming Shuhui from Jilin Province in China told KCNA:
					
					 "This is the first time for me to visit Mt. Kumgang.
					
					 People are so friendly, mountain is beautiful and water is very clear.
					
					 I drank the Samrok water on the way to the Kuryong Pool. It is said that the water makes the skin soft, so I am going to bring a bottle of this water with me to China.
					
					 The Kuryong Falls is a scenic spot with breathtaking landscape. 
					
					 Back home, I will tell about Mt. Kumgang to my friends and family members."
					
					 Liu Dezhong from Changchun City in Jilin Province of China said that Mt. Kumgang is so fantastic and that he would come here again with his friends.
					
					 Shen Jizhu from Shandong Province in China said:
					
					 "I felt refreshed to tour Mt. Kumgang. 
					
					 I am pleasant to see the crystal-like water in the Sea Kumgang. Mt. Kumgang is really one of very attractive tourist destinations."

articles.title: DPRK Products Popular at Pyongyang Spring Int'l Trade Fair
articles.content:
DPRK Products Popular at Pyongyang Spring Int'l Trade Fair
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- A plenty of locally-made products, displayed at the 16th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair, gave glimpse of the economic progress in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The Korea General Machinery Trading Corporation put on display such machine tools as Kusong 8A-1500 and CNC lathe Kusong 104-250 and hard alloy tools. The serviceable life of those hard alloy tools is twice that of the existing ones.
					
					 Among attractions were also vertical machining centre RV-25A, CNC lathe RT-210 and voltage regulator RCVF-85KVA, presented by the Ryonha Machinery Company.
					
					 The Korea Pusong Corporation came with varieties of electric machinery parts, including DC and AC motors and relays, and kinds of insulators. According to Kim Thae Song, an official of the corporation, its products are now in hot demand in many European, Asian and African countries.
					
					 Laptops of different sizes, presented by the Korea Computer Center and the Achim-Panda Computer Joint Venture Company, are also marketeering ones. What caught the eyes was the portable LED projector, which can be used to view TV and multimedia in any place.
					
					 Ri Song Jun, an official of the Peace Motors Corporation, said that his corporation, with 36 kinds of vehicles on display, scored a big deal in the fair.
					
					Kim Hye Yong, an official of the Korea Ryonhap Trading Corporation, said that her corporation exhibited over 50 kinds of nonferrous metal products, including lubricants and bearings, which have been introduced to various economic sectors.
					
					 Many other local corporations and joint-venture companies, too, presented products helpful to bettering the people's wellbeing.

articles.title: S. Korea's Servile Diplomacy Will Invite Disgrace: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
S. Korea's Servile Diplomacy Will Invite Disgrace: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The aftermath of the U.S. trip by the south Korean chief executive is increasingly getting serious.
					 She applauded the visit, claiming "package strategic alliance", "core axis" and "tightening of ties sealed in blood" but the fact is quite contrary to it.
					
					 She personally called on her staff to take follow-up measures as regards "agreements", a clear indication of serious problems that occurred during the visit.
					
					 Problem is that there is no clear proposal to any matter even though she set about to implement those agreements at Washington's beck and call. Even though "agreements" were made on lots of issues, there were no substantial results.
					
					 On top of that, the sex scandal in which her suite member was involved was accused as an unprecedented happening in the international history of diplomacy which plunged Chongwadae into havoc.
					
					 This is an unavoidable result of her acts of sycophantic treachery.
					
					 As well known, the U.S. trip by her was, in a word, a mendicant trip reflective of her servile diplomacy. During her visit she won assurances for her five years' stay in power and protection for existence in return for her virulent rhetoric against the DPRK and commitment to cooperate for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 Throughout her trip, she trumpeted confrontation policy called "trust process" little different from traitor Lee Myung Bak's watchwords of "no nukes, opening and 3 000 dollars" and made such nonsensical remarks as "north's dismantlement of nuclear program" and "provocation".
					
					 Serious is that she talked about "unattainable goal" apparently referring to the DPRK's line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the nuclear force up-building. She made no scruple of making rubbish, crying out for "change" more often than not. 
					
					 But the master's attitude was generally cold despite her virulent remarks. It was because she went to meet her master without any proposals for helping his DPRK policy get out of labyrinth despite his hints on several occasions in the past.
					
					 This was clearly proved by disrespectful treatment accorded to her from humble reception at the airport to the departure and different statement of stand.
					
					 A typical example is the gun salute during her visit to the Arlington National Cemetery.
					
					 The participants were the U.S. ambassador to south Korea and a few Americans. The gun salute was, in fact, for the dead in the Korean war and other aggression wars rather than for the visitor.
					
					 But she courted the U.S. favor, calling the U.S. forces in south Korea "good friends" and an American family that has lived in south Korea for three generations since the Korean war a "living witness of the six decades of south Korea-U.S. alliance" and praising their "dedication".
					
					 The same is the case with her speech at U.S. Congress.
					
					 Even though the U.S. ruler said it was an honor bestowed upon only close friends, it was, in actuality, a shame on her.
					
					 As reported by the puppet media, such a floor was given only to Lee Myung Bak, die-hard sycophantic traitor. The south Korean chief executive was made to take the floor in a place little different from a confirmation hearing which even nominees for high-ranking posts of the U.S. administration are reluctant to. It was aimed to review her policy proposals and to have general idea of her.
					
					 The joint press conference, in particular, was a theatre that revealed the master-servant relationship between the U.S. and south Korea and the servile nature of the trip, as was commented by foreign media and experts.
					
					 At the press conference, the U.S. president complimented the stand specified by her to tighten cooperation for confrontation with the north but as for other issues he only made brief comments as such that it was an issue which he had already thought of and that he has similar idea.
					
					 But when it turned to south Korea's disagreement on the participation in the U.S.-led missile defense system, the U.S. president said that they will make joint investment of capabilities and technology in missile defense and thus conduct joint operations with success. This pushed the stooge into predicament.
					
					 When she was embarrassed, he coaxed her like a little girl, saying that she has understood the realistic situation even though conflict was unavoidable.
					
					 Commenting on this, media and the public said it was a "courtesy" and "pressure" at the same time, reflecting U.S.-style arrogance of pressing others to accept its demand.
					
					 Toward the end of the trip, the master fed the media the sex scandal by a high-ranking official of Chongwadae, thus attaching a disgraceful tag to south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean chief executive deserved such a treatment for her mendicant trip.
					
					 The international public, describing the trip, remarked "an ambiguous part in the U.S.-south Korea summit", "impossible 'Seoul process' initiative" and "'Northeast Asia peace initiative' that can hardly elicit U.S. support".
					
					 All facts prove that she can gain nothing from collusion with the U.S. and confrontation with fellow countrymen but only denunciation from the nation and contempt from her master.
					
					 It is the south Korean chief executive herself who is standing at the crossroads of outsiders or the nation and confrontation or reunification.
					
					 She should clearly understand that she can not evade a tragic end as her predecessors if she presses ahead with her master's hostile and war policy toward the DPRK, oblivious of the lesson taught by history.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms Kwangju Massacre Fascist Violence
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms Kwangju Massacre Fascist Violence
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Military hooligans turned Kwangju of south Korea into a "bathtub of blood" in May, 33 years ago. This was an extreme fascist action which quenched the people's desire for democracy by the most atrocious and brutal method.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 After holding the real power of the south Korean puppet military through the "army purge coup" on December 12, 1979, the military gangsters hatched plots to seize power. Finally in May the next year they openly moved to hold control of the regime.
					
					 Under the situation where the struggle for democracy against fascism rapidly mounted among the broad range of people, the "yusin" remnants carried out bloody coup to revive the "yusin system" and intensify the military fascist rule. They were on the verge of collapse in the face of the worsened contradiction and conflict among the inside rulers.
					
					 The military hooligans made no scruple of committing indiscriminate massacre against the Kwangju people who offered resistance.
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. which manipulated the south Korean troops from the backstage to mercilessly quell the south Koreans' desire for democracy.
					
					 Even today the people's desire for democracy and human rights are being mercilessly violated in south Korea.
					
					 History and the situation refresh a bitter lesson that the democratic development of society and human rights can never be guaranteed as long as the U.S. colonial system to dominate south Korea goes on and the traitorous ruling forces who quench the desire and demand of the people as the stooge of foreign forces are allowed to take power.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Getting Profits from Situation on Korean Peninsula: Paper
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Getting Profits from Situation on Korean Peninsula: Paper
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the French paper Les Echos reported the U.S. munitions industry has benefited from the deterioration of the situation on the Korean Peninsula. According to it, Lockheed Martin, Boeing and many other U.S. munitions enterprises struck lots of arms sales deals with south Korea, taking advantages of the tension that flared up on the peninsula due to the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills that lasted two months from early March.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday commenting on it says: This fact discloses the main purposes sought by the U.S. in pushing the situation on peninsula to the brink of a nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. basic purposes in launching a huge nuclear war racket were to round off the preparations for a nuclear war to stifle the DPRK and to gain an opportunity for putting it into practice.
					
					 Another purpose sought by the U.S. was to line the pockets of the munitions enterprises and find a way out of an economic crisis by selling more weapons to south Korea under the pretext of the situation on the peninsula and thus create a phase favorable for realizing its Asia-Pacific strategy.
					
					 The U.S. is indeed a top class warmonger who regularly stokes tension, provokes a war and gets profits from disturbance of peace and pain suffered by people in other countries.
					
					 The one way for coping with the U.S. act of escalating tension and its arms export and war export policy is to bolster the deterrent for self-defence.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Regime Accused of Shifting Blame for Deteriorated Situation onto DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Regime Accused of Shifting Blame for Deteriorated Situation onto DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean regime are urging the DPRK to "stop provocation", saying the tension on the Korean Peninsula has eased somewhat since the end of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a bylined commentary terms this a base chicanery of the U.S. and the south Korean regime to hide their true colors as war maniacs and brand the DPRK as a provocateur by falsifying the stark reality and misleading the public opinion.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The peninsula is still in perilous situation due to the provocative north-targeted war drills and arms buildup of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet trigger-happy forces.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. and the puppet forces, the masterminds who have strained the situation, being hell-bent on provocation, are urging the DPRK to "stop provocation". This is, indeed, a brazen-faced behavior.
					
					 It is very foolish of the U.S. and the south Korean regime to try to bring down the DPRK by force of arms. 
					
					 If they provoke a war, they will perish in the flames kindled by them.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Stirring up War Atmosphere
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Stirring up War Atmosphere 
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. staged another joint naval exercise with the super-large nuclear-powered carrier Nimitz strike group involved in the East and South seas of Korea despite the unanimous protest and denunciation of the DPRK and other peace-loving people of the world.
					 The U.S., however, let loose such rhetoric that there was no problem as it was an "annual" and "defensive" one.
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This was a revelation of extreme arrogance of the U.S. and a vivid manifestation of its nature as a burglar turning black into white.
					
					 It is well known that the U.S. entirely to blame for escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula has talked like a monk's chanting prayers about someone's "provocation" in a sinister bid to brand the DPRK as a criminal.
					
					 Had the U.S. wanted to see the detente and peace on the peninsula, it would have refrained from staging the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises extremely rattling the nerves of the DPRK.
					
					 But no one can notice such logical behavior on the part of the U.S.
					
					 It stands for a war, not peace, and for escalated tension, not detente. That is why it keeps fanning up the war atmosphere by mobilizing latest warships and task forces.
					
					 This made the DPRK draw a conclusion that it did not misjudge the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK will remain unchanged in its will for toughest counteractions against the U.S. as long as the latter persistently sticks to its hostile policy toward the former.

articles.title: Ultra-Right Conservative Forces Accused of Insulting Participants in Kwangju Popular Uprising
articles.content:
Ultra-Right Conservative Forces Accused of Insulting Participants in Kwangju Popular Uprising
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The right-wing conservative forces in south Korea have committed a series of reckless acts of distorting and defaming the essence of the May 18 Kwangju Popular Uprising, sparking off indignation among people of various social strata, according to the south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News on May 17.
					 The students' council of the literary college in Korea University of south Korea opened a photo exhibition outside the building of the university on May 15 to introduce the struggle of the participants in the Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					
					 That night unidentified hooligans committed such rowdyism as besmirching photos there before posting a leaflet terming the uprising "a rebellion" and a photo of traitor Chun Doo Hwan who commanded the massacre in Kwangju.
					
					 Not content with this, they openly posted their vandalism on an internet website and did not hesitate to brand the sponsors of the photo exhibition as "left-wing forces".
					
					 On May 7 the side of Songsin Women's University removed a wall-paper displayed by its students on the occasion of the 33rd anniversary of the uprising under the pretext that it failed to get any "prior permission."
					
					 Students formally applied for displaying the wall paper, but the university side turned it down for the mere reason that it dealt in detail with the actions of the uprisers.
					
					 The ultra-right conservative forces have become more reckless in their acts of defaming the actions of the south Korean people for independence, democracy and reunification under the rule of the daughter of the "yusin" dictator.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Patronizing Fascist Dictatorship
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Patronizing Fascist Dictatorship
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress in south Korea in a statement on May 16 denounced the puppet authorities for patronizing the fascist dictatorship.
					 The statement recalled that the decoration agency pressurized people not to sing a song related to the May 18 Kwangju popular uprising at an event marking it.
					
					 Reflected in the song which everybody sang in streets during the uprising is the will of the people to carry forward the spirit of the uprisers who laid down their lives while fighting against the dictatorial regime to achieve democracy of society, it said.
					
					 The statement accused the ultra-right conservative forces of intensifying their anachronistic acts of trampling down democracy and human rights at the beck and call of the present regime, while working hard to protect the dictatorial regime which killed people at the point of bayonet and distort history.
					
					 The behavior of the agency amounts to joining the ultra-right conservative forces which insult the departed soul of the uprisers who fought for democracy and national reunification against the dictatorship, it held.
					
					 If the agency defends the dictatorial regime's murder of people, it will face popular resistance, the statement warned.

articles.title: Japanese Rightist Element Urged to Apologize for His Remarks
articles.content:
Japanese Rightist Element Urged to Apologize for His Remarks
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Victims to sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in Kwangju City, Kyonggi Province of south Korea on May 19 issued a statement refuting the remarks made by a Japanese rightist element.
					 The statement expressed resentment at Osaka Mayor Hashimoto, a co-head of the Japan Restoration Party, who made remarks justifying the past crimes related to sexual slavery.
					
					 Those victims who were taken away as sexual slaves to the battlefields for aggression war ignited by Japan have not yet gotten rid of the nightmare in those days, the statement deplored.
					
					 It urged the Japanese government to apologize to the victims for his nonsensical remarks.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage North-targeted War Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage North-targeted War Drill
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The First Army Corps of the south Korean Ground Force announced it would stage "2013 Ssangyong" drill in Koyang and Phaju cities, Kyonggi Province from May 22 to 24, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 It was reported that large-scale attack means including planes, tanks and artillery pieces and reserve forces, more than 6,000 in all, will be involved in the drill.
					
					 The puppet warmongers also said they would stage a live shell drill.
					
					 "Ssangyong drill" aimed to form a unit with reserve forces and hurl it to the forefront is becoming increasingly provocative every year as a drill simulating an actual war.
					
					 The ceaseless north-targeted war maneuvers being staged by the warmongers in the forefront areas are escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers Stage Mass Actions in Kwangju
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers Stage Mass Actions in Kwangju
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Workers from across south Korea staged mass actions in Kwangju on May 17 on the occasion of the 33rd anniversary of the May 18 Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					 Representatives of the industrial trade unions and regional headquarters under the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and workers affiliated to those organizations staged a sit-in strike in front of the Mangwoldong Cemetery in protest against the puppet regime defaming the Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					
					 They accused the present regime of distorting the essence of the uprising and quelling the desire of the uprisers as the Lee Myung Bak regime did.
					
					 They assailed the regime for instructing the decoration agency, in particular, to pressurize people not to sing a song reflecting the spirit of the uprisers at an event commemorating the anniversary and unhesitatingly taking an action to write off the uprising in Kwangju in history. 
					
					 Then they held a rally at the plaza of Kwangju Railway Station.
					
					 They chanted slogans "Let's drive out Yankees, backstage wirepuller of the massacre in May!", "No war, No GIs, Let's Achieve Peace on the Korean Peninsula!"
					
					 Ryang Song Yun, chairman of the Interim Emergency Measure Committee of the Confederation of Trade Unions, in his address referred to the significance of the May popular resistance staged to achieve democracy of society in defiance of the military fascist forces.
					
					 He called upon the workers and all other people to turn out in the struggle to defend independence and democracy of society and peace against the regime yielding to the U.S. and encroaching upon the people's interests, the era of bringing dictatorship and the threat of war to exterminate the nation.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, chief of the Kwangju Regional Headquarters of the confederation, Kim Jae Ha, chief of the Pusan Regional Headquarters of the confederation, and Ri Kwang Sok, chairman of the Federation of Peasants Associations, laid bare the real intention of the U.S. which was brought to light through its brutal killing of uprisers.
					
					 A resolution was read out at the rally.
					
					 It called for staging actions to have part-time jobs abolished, win the vital rights, terminate dictatorship and achieve peace against the U.S. and war through the concerted efforts of the workers by inheriting the spirit of the martyrs who laid down their lives in the bloody resistance.
					
					 A memorial service took place at the Mangwoldong Cemetery on that evening.

articles.title: Koreans in China Hold U.S. and S. Korean Regime Chiefly Accountable for Military Provocations
articles.content:
Koreans in China Hold U.S. and S. Korean Regime Chiefly Accountable for Military Provocations
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Association of Koreans in China made public a statement "What do the ceaseless DPRK-targeted war exercises imply?" on May 14.
					 The statement accused the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces of staging large-scale joint naval maneuvers targeted against the DPRK together with south Korean puppet army in the East Sea of Korea with a nuclear carrier flotilla involved.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear carrier task force, a force huge enough to carry out a nuclear war, entered Pusan Port for joint naval maneuvers, the statement said, and went on: They sparked off worldwide concern and criticism as they further escalated the tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities painted these ceaseless war drills against the DPRK staged with all sorts of aggression forces involved as "annual" ones for "defensive purposes." This rhetoric only self-exposed that they were none other than warmongers and military provocateurs who have steadily escalated the tension on the Korean Peninsula by staging such large-scale military drills every year.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the U.S. imperialist aggressors staged even a large-scale north-targeted saber-rattling by introducing a super-large nuclear carrier into south Korea right after the south Korean chief executive's trip to the U.S.
					
					 This goes to prove that her trip was aimed to consult with her master over a war scenario to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Korean Organizations in China Support DPRK's Military Steps
articles.content:
Korean Organizations in China Support DPRK's Military Steps
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Korean organizations in China supported the "Appeal to all Koreans" made public by the Information Department of the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front through website "By our nation itself."
					 The Shenyang branch of the General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on May 15 said that the Korean Peninsula has been put in the state of war due to the war exercises of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet war-like forces against the DPRK.
					
					 In case the second Korean war breaks out on the peninsula it would bring unspeakable destruction and genocide incomparable with that in the last century, it noted.
					
					 Fully supporting the military steps taken by the DPRK, the statement stressed Koreans in China would turn out as one in the just struggle for frustrating the DPRK-targeted war moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers and bringing earlier the day of reunified Korea together with the people in the homeland all out in confrontation with the U.S. by tightly holding nuclear deterrence for self-defence as a treasured sword for defending the nation.
					
					 The Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on May 16 said that the war hysteria of the U.S. which staged drills for attacking the DPRK with nuclear carriers involved meant the height of last-ditch efforts of the bellicose forces to stifle it by force of arms, an indication that the U.S. remains unchanged in its ambition to invade it, the statement added.
					
					 Whoever loves peace against war will never remain a passive onlooker to the reckless acts of the war-thirsty forces, it noted, calling on all Koreans to turn out in the resistance against the U.S., chieftain of war of aggression.
					
					 It also appealed to them to turn out in the struggle against pro-U.S. war maniacs.
					
					 It called on all Koreans to support the DPRK's measures for self-defence.

articles.title: Action for Conclusion of Peace Treaty Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action for Conclusion of Peace Treaty Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- An editor of Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., issued an article calling for the conclusion of a peace treaty on May 18.
					 Nearly 60 years have passed since the Armistice Agreement (AA) was signed, but a peace treaty has not yet been concluded and the danger of a nuclear war is increasing on the Korean Peninsula as never before, the article said.
					
					 It is because the U.S. has not honored the AA from the outset, it noted, adding:
					
					 The U.S. has deployed lots of nuclear weapons in south Korea and threatened the north. Washington is becoming all the more undisguised in its hostile policy toward the north, after singling it out as the target of a nuclear attack.
					
					 U.S. nuclear umbrella can never guarantee peace.
					
					 In order to ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula, all the Koreans should struggle for the conclusion of the DPRK-U.S. peace treaty.

articles.title: African Regional Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Uganda
articles.content:
African Regional Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Uganda
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- An African regional seminar on "The Juche Idea and Lesson for Independent Reform of Africa" took place in Kampala, Uganda on May 11. 
					 On display in the venue were photos documenting revolutionary lives and exploits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and activities of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 There were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and other Korean books. On display also was the slogan reading "Long live Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism". 
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the portraits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The senior advisor to the Ugandan president made a keynote report to be followed by a congratulatory speech by the head of the delegation of the Social Scientists Society of Korea.
					
					 The secretary general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and delegates from different countries made speeches. 
					
					 The reporter and speakers praised the Generalissimos as great teacher and eternal sun of progressive mankind, highly appreciating the immortal feats they made for the Korean revolution and the accomplishment of global independence by creating the Juche idea, Songun idea and developing in depth them. 
					
					 The African people should regard Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as an almighty treasured sword and get united to smash the U.S. imperialists and other domination forces' moves for aggression and interference and build an independent and peaceful future of the continent, they said. 
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar. 
					
					 An appeal to the Juche idea followers of the world "Let us vigorously turn out in the drive for defending just cause of the Korean people" was issued. 
					
					 The appeal said under the leadership of Kim Jong Un the Korean people have gained shining successes in carrying forward the cause of independence, the revolutionary cause of Juche, that started by Kim Il Sung and was victoriously led by Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The Korean people's struggle is the just one and their cause serves as a fortress of global independence and a signpost of victory, it noted.
					
					 It called for dynamically turning out in the movement for resolutely rejecting the U.S. and its allied forces' moves for domination, interference and aggression and defending the just cause of the Korean people. 
					
					 It also called for positively conducting the worldwide solidarity movement for the Korean people in their efforts to simultaneously push forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force, upholding the banner of independence and justice. 
					
					 The just cause of the Korean people and other progressives of the world advancing under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism will surely emerge victorious, it stressed.
					
					 Present at the seminar were the director general, secretary general and directors of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea from different countries including Tanzania, Egypt and Nigeria, and Ugandan personages from the government, the National Resistance Movement, the parliament and media organs including the senior advisor to the president. 
					
					 The DPRK ambassador to Uganda and members of the delegation of the Social Scientists Society of Korea were present at the seminar on invitation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Foreigners
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in the seminar of the African region on the "Juche Idea and Lesson for Independent Reform of Africa" on May 11.
					 Kim Jong Un formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the letter said, noting its great significance in the development of the era and history was confirmed again in the seminar.
					
					 The man who will lead the world along the way of carrying out the cause of independence is only respected HE Kim Jong Un, the letter said. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The true picture of socialist Korea can be seen in demonstrating its might as a country manufacturing and launching satellites and as a nuclear weapons state despite any nuclear threat and blackmail by the imperialist allied forces. It is exactly the great image of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Un the just struggle of the DPRK will make a steady victorious progress and a new turn will be brought about in accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 The Juche idea is a great banner which humankind should hold highly as it is the most scientific and revolutionary theory whose validity and vitality have been proven through the reality of history.
					
					 It said that they would apply to the practical situation of the continent the experiences gained by the DPRK in achieving great successes in the building of a prosperous and powerful nation and in the standoff with the U.S. under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un and thus contribute to building independent and peaceful Africa and carrying out the cause of global independence.
					
					 The letter extended full support and solidarity to the just struggle of the Korean people for defending prosperity and sovereignty of the country.
					
					 The cause of global independence will surely emerge victorious as long as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism brightly indicates the way ahead.

articles.title: French Bodies Carry News of March Plenary Meeting of WPK Central Committee

French Bodies Carry News of March Plenary Meeting of WPK Central Committee
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- French organizations carried the news of the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee Formed in Spain to Mark War Victory Day of DPRK
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee Formed in Spain to Mark War Victory Day of DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Korean Friendship Association was inaugurated in Tarragona, Spain on May 13 to commemorate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to open a special website to mark the significant anniversary and post on it works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and photos documenting the brilliant victory won by the Korean people in the war.
					
					 It also decided to hold diverse events under the sponsorship of branches of the association in different countries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad 405 de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad 405 de EPC
Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la unidad 405 del EPC.
					Expresando gran esperanza y conviccion de que los militares de la unidad defenderan con firmeza la valiosa patria socialista, el Mariscal entrego como recuerdo el binoculo y el fusil automatico a la compania adscrita a la unidad y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					El Mariscal recorrio la sala del historial de la unidad.
					
					Recordo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il presto a la unidad una peculiar esperanza y atencion y apunto que los oficiales y soldados deben unirse cada vez que se enfrenten con dificultades para convertir la unidad en una fila de combate de acero guardando en el corazon el noble proposito del Dirigente reflejado en la orgullosa bandera del ejercito que flamea a la cabeza de la fila.
					
					Frente al retrato de Ju Tong Gil, ex comandante de la unidad que se esforzo hasta el ultimo momento de su vida por la complementacion de los preparativos de combate, el Mariscal recordo a el, a quien tampoco olvidaba el Dirigente.
					
					En la biblioteca vio varios libros y datos de educacion ideologica y cultural enviados por el PTC.
					
					En la sala de estudios de operacion recibio el parte sobre el estado de cumplimiento de mision y ejercicios.
					
					Es muy importante la mision encargada de la unidad, asevero el Comandante Supremo y dio las programaticas tareas que sirven de guia en perfeccionar los preparativos de combate de la unidad.
					
					El Mariscal paso revista al comedor y depositos de alimentos subsidiarios y soya de la unidad.
					
					Acto seguido, el Mariscal recorrio la compania adscrita a la unidad.
					
					Dando recorrido por el cuartel, la sala de educacion y el bano, se mostro muy satisfecho de que son magnificas todas las condiciones para el servicio militar.
					
					Al visitar la unidad bien acondicionada, me viene a la memoria el Dirigente quien decia tener el plan de visitarla, senalo y agrego con emocion que seria mejor si visitara la unidad junto al Dirigente.
					
					Al fin de su recorrido de la compania, el Mariscal presencio la funcion artistica de los uniformados de la compania.
					
					Los ejecutantes presentaron diversas piezas tales como la narracion y coro "No tiene fin la anoranza", el coro "El es nuestro intimo Comandante Supremo", el coro-dialogo "La compania es querida casa natal", la poesia y coro "Defenderemos a costa de la vida al General Kim Jong Un".
					
					El Comandante Supremo envio efusiva ovacion viendo la funcion de los militares.
					
					Seguidamente, departio con los militares de la compania y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					El mismo dia, el Comandante Supremo visito la familia del oficial Kang Yong Sun y se entero en detalles del estado de construccion de las viviendas de los oficiales de la unidad.
					
					En la ocasion le acompanaron Jang Jong Nam, Son Chol Ju, Jon Chang Bok, Rim Kwang Il y Ri Man Gon.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita estacion no. 621 de mejoramiento de variedades de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita estacion no. 621 de mejoramiento de variedades de EPC
Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio la estacion no. 621 de mejoramiento de variedades que construye ahora el EPC.
					El envio cordial saludo a los constructores militares que le aclamaban.
					
					Recorriendo varios puntos de la estacion, el Mariscal hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de construccion.
					
					Se puso muy complacido al ver los herbazales formados en una superficie extensa y numerosos edificios que tomaron ya sus figuras.
					
					Los constructores militares hicieron muchas cosas en un corto plazo para cumplir mi orden de proponer la obra y comenzar la construccion de la estacion con el fin de criar los ganados herbivoros de buena variedad como cabra y enviarlos a todo el ejercito, evaluo.
					
					Senalo que lo mas importante es mejorar la investigacion cientifica para criar muchas cabras de buena especie y averiguo como va la construccion del instituto de cabra.
					
					Informado del estado de construccion de viviendas a ser distribuidas a los empleados de la estacion, el destaco la necesidad de levantar buenas viviendas en diversos puntos para que aparezcan aldeas pintorescas en la zona periferica.
					
					En el campo de construccion de corrales de reproduccion, pregunto cual fue la pauta de ubicacion de corrales e instruyo crear racionalmente las praderas y ubicar los edificios.
					
					Seguidamente, vio las cabras de buenas especies que se crian en la estacion.
					
					Tras escuchar el parte de que las cabras enviadas por el Mariscal se reproducen mas rapido que las anteriores variedades, se engordan en un corto tiempo y dan carnes de buena calidad, subrayo que hay que impulsar bien la reproduccion amplia de esas variedades.
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il habian ensenado que hay que obtener la carne mediante la cria de ganados vegetarianos, dijo y enfatizo que el EPC debe ponerse al frente de la lucha por realizar los propositos de los Generalisimos.
					
					La estacion no. 621 de mejoramiento de variedades del EPC es una importante base ganadera para obtener muchas cabezas de ganados de buenas especies y enviarlas a los militares, senalo e indico las tareas y remedios que se presentan en terminar la construccion hasta el dia conmemorativo de fundacion del PTC de este ano y criar en grandes cantidades los ganados herbivoros.
					
					En esta ocasion el Mariscal fue acompanado por Jang Jong Nam, Son Chol Ju, Jon Chang Bok, Rim Kwang Il y el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Ri Man Gon.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Yemen
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Yemen
Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 21 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica del Yemen, Abd Rabbuh Mansur Al Hadi, con motivo de la fiesta nacional de este pais.

articles.title: RPDC toma medidas para prevenir  gripe aviar
articles.content:
RPDC toma medidas para prevenir  gripe aviar
Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea toma las medidas para prevenir la gripe aviar.
					Segun la inspeccion realizada el dia 7 por el Centro Nacional de Prevencion Veterinaria, el Instituto de Veterinaria de la Academia de Ciencia Agricola y otras unidades relacionadas, ocurrio la gripe aviar tipo H5N1 por el contacto de las aves migratorias con los patos de la Granja de Patos de Tudan de Pyongyang.
					
					Se informo el estado de lo ocurrido a las organizaciones internacionales interesadas, entre otras, la Organizacion de las Naciones Unidas para la Agricultura y la Alimentacion y  la Organizacion Internacional de Veterinaria, mientras la Granja enterro mas de 160 mil patos y tomo las rigurosas medidas de interrupcion, cuarentena y desinfeccion. 
					
					En ambito nacional, se instalaron mas de mil 360 puestos de vigilancia veterinaria para observar el estado de los ganados y aves salvajes.
					
					Los organos veterinarios provinciales elevan la capacidad de diagnosis y se esfuerzan por aumentar la produccion de vacunas. 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, se impulsa la labor profilactica de gripe aviaria tipo H7N9 que causa muchos contagios y muertos. 
					
					El Comite Estatal de Prevencion Veterinaria Emergente, organizado por las unidades interesadas como el Ministerio de Agricultura y el de Salud Publica controla la labor profilactica en colaboracion con los puestos de direccion provinciales, urbanos y distritales. 
					
					Se realizan el chequeo medico y la propaganda higienica intensiva en todos los criaderos de ganados y aves. 
					
					En los aeropuertos, puertos y estaciones fronterizas se intensifican la inspeccion medica sobre las aves y las personas provenientes de las zonas  donde ocurrio la gripe aviar se restringen temporalmente la circulacion de aves domesticas. 
					
					Y hacen criarlas en los corrales. 
					
					Los organos sanitarios realizan la propaganda higienica entre los moradores e inspeccionan los objetos sospechosos para hacer a tiempo la diagnosis y tratamiento. 
					
					En la propaganda higienica toman parte activamente las unidades de educacion, prensa e informacion, etc. y las entidades sociales.

articles.title: Turistas maravillados del paisaje del monte Kumgang
articles.content:
Turistas maravillados del paisaje del monte Kumgang
Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- El primer grupo de turismo internacional Rason-monte Kumgang a bordo del barco "Estrella Real" llego el dia 20 al puerto de Kosong.
					En el puerto estaba colgada la consigna "Calida bienvenida al grupo de turismo internacional al monte Kumgang a bordo de ´Estrella Real´".
					
					Los turistas fueron acogidos por los funcionarios interesados y los trabajadores de distintos estratos del distrito de Kosong.
					
					Los miembros principales del grupo depositaron ramos de flores ante el mural de mosaico "El Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el monte Paektu" erguido frente al Hotel Kumgangsan y rindieron homenaje postumo a esos lideres coreanos.
					
					Los integrantes del grupo recorrieron ese dia la laguna Kuryong, el Templo Singye, el Kumgang Maritimo y el lago Samil.
					
					Ming Shuhui (44 anos de edad), turista proveniente de la provincia de Jilin de China, dijo a la ACNC como sigue:
					
					Vine primera vez al monte Kumgang.
					
					Aqui conoci a la gente buena y vi la naturaleza magnifica y las aguas cristalinas.
					
					Probe el agua Samrok en la laguna Kuryong y me llevare a China una botella porque me contaron que esa agua blanquea la cara.
					
					Es muy grande la cascada Kuryong y es hermoso su paisaje.
					
					Cuando vuelva a China, contare a mis amigos y familiares lo que he visto y sentido de este monte hermoso para que vengan a visitarlo mucho mas chinos.
					
					El ciudadano de Changchun de la provincia de Jilin de China, Liu Dezhong (63 anos de edad), dijo sonriente que el monte Kumgang es mucho mas elegante de lo que pensaba y volveria a visitarlo sin falta con sus amigos.
					
					El habitante de la provincia de Shandong de China, Shen Jizhu (49 anos de edad), senalo que le gusto mucho el limpio Kumgang Maritimo y no es facil buscar en este mundo un lugar como este.
